thread.title: Spotted: Mata holds back Young as Man Utd and Middlesbrough players clash in the tunnel
thread.title_full: Spotted: Mata holds back Young as Man Utd and Middlesbrough players clash in the tunnel

title: Spotted: Mata holds back Young as Man Utd and Middlesbrough players clash in the tunnel
text:
1 of 9 Manchester United and Middlesbrough players clash in the tunnel at the Riverside 
Jose Mourinho's players have been blamed for triggering the ugly clash in the tunnel after Manchester United's 3-1 win over Middlesbrough on Sunday. 
However, Juan Mata appears to have good intentions after the Spaniard is seen dragging back team-mate Ashley Young as things kicked off between the two teams. 
Boro captain Ben Gibson reportedly had to also be restrained during the nasty scenes. 
Scroll through the gallery above to see the best pictures of the tunnel bust-up between Manchester United and Middlesbrough. Related articles
